alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 4:33PM EDT until August 10 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 433 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bainbridge, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Climax, Brinson, Hanover, Ausmac, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Faceville, Fowlstown and Cyrene. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
